text:
@Timcast Because you can't enforce illegal mandates, without manipulated figures.
Where are the millions of bodies in the streets succumbing to this plague?
Assigning Covid-19 to any form of death is their lie.
All this, just to destroy @realDonaldTrump and America Herself.
